arts.ttl: Dembélé misses penalty but Fabián lifts PSG to win over Angers in Ligue 1
arts.sum: The Champions League winners rallied to beat Tottenham on penalties to lift the European Super Cup last week. Ousmane Dembélé missed a penalty but Fabián Ruiz scored to help Paris Saint-Germain edge Angers 1-0 in its first home game in Ligue 1 on Friday.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Luis Enrique doesn’t mince his words: “Many things to improve.”
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 1-0 against Angers this Friday at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. After the match, Parisian coach Luis Enrique spoke to Ligue 1+. Luis Enrique: “There’s still plenty of time to be at 100%.” Was it a successful match for you? It was a match we expected. […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Neves is delighted with the team and endorses Vitinha
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 1-0 against Angers this Friday at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1. After the match, Parisian midfielder João Neves (20 years old) spoke to Ligue 1+. He had a lot of good things to say about his teammates. Neves: “People who watched the match saw a […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Ruiz savors his goal and especially “the victory”
arts.sum: Fabian Ruiz, 29-year-old Paris Saint-Germain midfielder, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 1-0 victory over Angers this Friday at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. He was understandably happy. Ruiz: “We have to keep this up.” Were you able to turn this match around? Yes, it wasn’t easy because Angers […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – The Parisians’ ratings: Ruiz scores, the attackers still getting used to it
arts.sum: This Friday, on Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026, Paris Saint-Germain faced Angers at the Parc des Princes. After a match in which the Red and Blue outrageously dominated, they won 1-0. Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (5.5) – A very quiet match for him. Defenders – Achraf Hakimi […]

arts.ttl: PSG/Angers – Luis Enrique values the team and the return to the Parc des Princes
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique spoke at a press conference this Thursday ahead of tomorrow’s Ligue 1 Matchday 2 clash with Angers (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., live on Ligue1+). The Spaniard also gave an interview to PSG TV, where he highlighted the importance of the squad as a whole and reflected on the team’s return […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Official lineups: Neves starts, not Zabarnyi
arts.sum: This Friday at the Parc des Princes, second-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face seventh-placed Angers on Matchday 2 of Ligue 1 2025-2026 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET). Here are the official lineups for this match: As always, we’ll wait until kickoff to be sure of the tactical plans PSG (4-3-3): Barcola – Dembélé – Doué Ruiz […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Angers – Live coverage of the Parisians’ pre-match
arts.sum: This Friday, as part of Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, second-place Paris Saint-Germain will face seventh-place Angers at the Parc des Princes. With kickoff at 8:45 p.m. CET, the club is offering a live pre-match coverage of the players’ warm-ups starting at 7:45 p.m. Watch the live stream here:

arts.sum: This Friday, second-placed Paris Saint-Germain will face seventh-placed Angers at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 2 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET).
